title: Final Year Project in Communication
description: This module is an application-led innovative research project that allows students to blend direct hands-on industry experience with theory in conducting research. It situates the learning within an application framework by allowing students to formulate an applied research project for an organisation that could be introduced by the instructor or self-sourced by students. The module will cover basic applied communication research methods and their applications for communication consulting practices. As a capstone module, students will apply theory and practice to consultancy work by analysing and producing research reports that are industry ready.
prerequisite: Completed at least 20MCs of NMC modules, including the core modules for the student’s specialisation.
